gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 119, Raptors 116
gameRecap.excerpt: Scottie Barnes missed a potential game-tying 3PT shot at the buzzer as the Raptors fall to the Hornets, 119-116. Gordon Hayward (24 points), Miles Bridges (22 points, eight rebounds), Terry Rozier (21 points, 13 assists), and Brandon Miller (20 points) led the Hornets in the win. Scottie Barned tallied his second triple-double of the season and third of his career with 31 points, 10 rebounds, and 10 assists for Toronto as Pascal Siakam added 25 points. The Hornets improve to 7-13 as the Raptors move to 9-13.
